questions.question: How many total customers do we have?
questions.friendlyResponse: We currently have a total of 10 customers. Thank you for asking!

questions.question: Which products has the highest total sales revenue
questions.sql:
ite
SELECT p.name, SUM(oi.quantity * oi.price_at_purchase) AS total_revenue
FROM order_items oi
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id
GROUP BY p.product_id
ORDER BY total_revenue DESC
LIMIT 1;

questions.question: what are the busiest hours of the day?
questions.sql:
SELECT STRFTIME('%H', order_date) AS hour, COUNT(*) AS order_count
FROM orders
GROUP BY hour
ORDER BY order_count DESC;
questions.friendlyResponse: The busiest hour of the day is 8 AM, with three recorded activities. The rest of the hours have only one activity each, making 8 AM the stand-out busy time!

questions.question: Which employee handled the most orders?
questions.sql:
SELECT e.name, e.employee_id, COUNT(o.order_id) AS order_count
FROM employees e
JOIN orders o ON e.employee_id = o.employee_id
GROUP BY e.employee_id
ORDER BY order_count DESC
LIMIT 1;
questions.friendlyResponse: It looks like John Kim handled the most orders, with a total of 4! Keep up the great work, John!

questions.question: Which supplier provide the most products
questions.sql:
SELECT supplier, COUNT(product_id) AS product_count
FROM inventory_restocks
GROUP BY supplier
ORDER BY product_count DESC
LIMIT 1;
questions.friendlyResponse: It looks like Premium Coffee Suppliers offer the most products with a total of 4! Let me know if you need more information.
